attributes.queryObj: select a.*,b.name employeeName,b.phone empPhone,c.name repairerName from DORM_RepairApply a inner join HR_Employee b on a.employeeId=b.id inner join DORM_Repairer c on a.repairerId=c.id where a.id=?
attributes.querySql: select 'update' recordOperateStatus,a.id,a.name,a.description from DORM_RepairApplyDtl a inner join DORM_RepairApply b on a.hdrId=b.id  where a.hdrId=?
attributes.queryDamageSql:
select a.id,a.employeeId,a.amount,a.description,a.occurDate,a.reason,
		b.name empName,b.number empNumber,'update' recordOperateStatus  
		from Dorm_Damage a
		left join HR_Employee b on a.employeeId=b.id 
		where a.repairApplyId=?

sqlList.sql: select code,name from  TS_SysCode where codeKind=4
select code value,name text from TS_SysCode where codeKind=130
select id value,name text from Dorm_building where parentId is null
